citation.title: Kircher and Steno on the “geocosm,” with a reassessment of the role of Gassendi's works

blogs.title: Happy birthday, Athanasius Kircher
blogs.summary: By the year 1631, residents of southern Italy had perhaps grown complacent about the volcano that destroyed Pompeii. But near the end of that year, Mount Vesuvius reminded them of its power. From December 1631 to January 1632, explosive activity at Vesuviu

author.name: Earth Matters
author.description: Earth is an amazing planet, and the one that matters most to us. Let’s have a conversation about it.
